title: Bloomberg Markets: Chart of the Day, Eco Brief for June 19
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Chart of the Day, Eco Brief for June 19
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Carl J Riccadonna Chief U.S. Economist Bloomberg Intelligence Discussing the economy and markets with Bloomberg Stocks Editor Dave Wilson, who also discusses his Chart of the Day "S&P 500 top stocks' influence seen as nothing unusual." Email Dave at DWilson@bloomberg.net to sign up for the Chart.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
